movies.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
movies.synopsis: Jedi Knights Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi discover Anakin Skywalker while the Sith return.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
movies.synopsis: Anakin Skywalker reunites with Padme Amidala as Obi-Wan investigates the clone army and the Separatist threat.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
movies.synopsis: The Clone Wars end, Anakin Skywalker falls to the dark side, and Darth Sidious declares the Galactic Empire.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.synopsis: Luke Skywalker joins the Rebel Alliance to destroy the Death Star.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
movies.synopsis: The Empire scatters the Rebels while Luke trains with Yoda and confronts Darth Vader.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
movies.synopsis: The Rebels launch a final assault on the Empire and Luke seeks to redeem his father.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
movies.synopsis: Scavenger Rey crosses paths with Finn and Han Solo as the First Order rises.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi
movies.synopsis: The Resistance flees the First Order while Rey searches for guidance from Luke Skywalker.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
movies.synopsis: The Resistance faces a resurgent Emperor Palpatine as Rey confronts her destiny.

movies.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
movies.synopsis: Jyn Erso leads a daring mission to steal the Death Star plans for the Rebel Alliance.

movies.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
movies.synopsis: Young Han Solo meets Chewbacca and Lando Calrissian during a high-stakes heist.

movies.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
movies.synopsis: Anakin Skywalker and his new Padawan Ahsoka Tano race to rescue Jabba the Hutt's son.
movies.notes: Feature length pilot for the animated series.

movies.title: Caravan of Courage: An Ewok Adventure
movies.synopsis: Stranded siblings Mace and Cindel Towani join the Ewoks to find their parents on Endor.
movies.notes: Made for television film released as an ABC special.

movies.title: Ewoks: The Battle for Endor
movies.synopsis: Cindel Towani and Wicket fight marauders threatening the Ewok village.

movies.title: The Star Wars Holiday Special
movies.synopsis: Han Solo and Chewbacca attempt to reach Kashyyyk in time for Life Day.
movies.notes: Variety special featuring the original trilogy cast.

movies.title: LEGO Star Wars Holiday Special
movies.synopsis: Rey travels through time to learn from Jedi across the saga.
movies.notes: Animated LEGO celebration of Life Day.

movies.title: LEGO Star Wars Terrifying Tales
movies.synopsis: Poe Dameron and BB-8 hear spooky stories inside Darth Vader's castle on Mustafar.

movies.title: LEGO Star Wars Summer Vacation
movies.synopsis: Finn plans a holiday trip while Force ghosts remind the crew to celebrate every season.
